name: Anna Fabbri
subtitle: Chief Financial Officer presso Randstad Group Italia
about: I've been working in Autogrill group for 20 years, 7 of which as Group Financial Reporting Manager, 6 as Head of Enterprise Risk Management Group, 2 as Head of Finance at Autogrill Germany and now as Group FInancial Services Director
experiences: Group Controlling and Financial Services Director

Responsible for directing the Finance function - Administration, Finance, Planning &Controlling departments - of Autogrill Deutschland, the German Company of Autogrill Group, Multinational Group listed on Milan Stock Exchange world leader in catering services for travelers
Main areas:
•	Administration: 
- oversee all the core accounting processes
- Local Statutory Financial statement
- Tax compliance and Corporate Affairs 
- Relationships with external suppliers: bank, insurance, lawyers, auditor
•	Finance
Treasury planning and cash flow management. Relationship with Banks and Group functions for CapEx allocation and Loan agreement  
•	Planning & Controlling
- Budget e mid-term plan definition and  Quarterly Forecast 
- Monthly financial reporting to HQ and discussion with Corporate functions
- Monthly analysis of results, cost controlling and discussion with operations to identify actions 
- Set up of Business case for CapEx to support business development
Head of Group Enterprise Risk Management

- Responsible of the  Group Enterprise Risk Management Model (which I have developed and implemented), integrated into the key Company processes to support:
•	management and the Board of Directors in key decision-making processes by the assessment of the risk profile and the volatility degree underlying financial targets set for budget, strategic plan, capex/investment, M&A
•	internal audit when preparing Internal Audit Plan
- Periodical direct presentation to the BoD and Risk Committee to report  on said topics
- Responsible to set and manage the Group’s International Insurance Programme
- Responsible for the “L.262/2005 compliance office”, ensuring to the Dirigente Preposto the management of the Law 262 compliance process throughout the Group Subsidiaries
Special projects:
Member of the Working Group of the following extraordinary operations:
- proportional partial demerger of Autogrill S.p.A. in favour of World Duty Free 
- listing of World duty Free on Milan Stock Exchange (October 1, 2013)

Other:
- Board member at ANRA for the period 2018-2020
- several interventions as a speaker in round tables and and at University courses

I was responsible for preparing the Consolidated Financial Statements and the Quarterly Reports.
Special projects: Implementation of the first Group consolidation system (SAP ECCS) for the statutory reporting.Implementation of the Group Reporting Guidelines for Group subsidiaries
